services.title: Pet visit
services.description: We will go with your little friend for a walk in the park, around the lake or somewhere while you don't have time for it.

services.title: Pet bath
services.description: The little friends will be bathed, taken care of their hair and really clean when you come to pick them up.

services.title: Pet grooming
services.description: Your dogs and cats will be neatly trimmed or styled as you want.

services.title: Flea treatment
services.description: If your pet has bugs in it, itches and is red because of them, come to us and come back clean..
